page.title: 13Population/Employment (1981)
page.content: { Kinross Milnathort Population 3500 1100 {Employment Agriculture% 2.0 6.3 Energy% 6.5 2.1 Manufacturing% 30.7 20.8 Construction% 12.4 10.4 Distrib.& Catering% 19.6 27.1 Transport% 5.2 2.1 Other Services% 22.2 31.3 Prop. of commuters 1:3 1:5 %households >=1 car 77 76 %houses >=5 rooms 37 28 %houses owner-occupied 59 53 %houses Council-owned 35 39 %houses lacking bath or inside W.C. 0.7 3.2 All of these figures have been extracted from the{1981 Census.}They apply to the whole of each place, although parts of each lie outside the sample area.
